product.description: From alpine maneuvering to freestyle frenzy, the Burton® Men's Hackett Jacket is built for absolute on-hill wrecking. This antifreeze flannel offers a longer fit, Mesh-Lined Pit Zips™ and diamond-quilted lining for unmatched comfort and rider-friendly style. Equipped with a DRYRIDE Durashell moisture-wicking exterior and 3M™ Thinsulate™ heavy insulation, Jack Frost doesn't even stand a chance.
product.name: Burton Men's Hackett Jacket 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Durashell fabric provides breathability and moisture-wicking properties
  • 3M™ Thinsulate™ quad insulation provides maximized warmth, comfort and mobility
  • Diamond-quilted taffeta lining offers cozy comfort
  • Mesh-Lined Pit Zips™ provide ventilation where you need it most
  • Critically-taped seams
  • Contoured, bonded heathered fleece hood
  • Internal goggle pocket with audio stash
  • Flip-up collar shield
  • Team fit provides extra length and coverage
  • Removable waist gaiter with jacket-to-pant interface
  • Fabric: DRYRIDE Durashell yarn-dyed flannel plaid
  • Style: 276401
  • Burton

product.description: A staple for single digit days, the Burton® Men's Hedge Fleece comes with all the winter trimmings to keep you cozy no matter what the winter throws at you. Delivering incredible warmth and heavenly softness, this zip-up offers itch-free comfort and essential breathability that's perfect for the lodge and beyond. With hand-warming pockets and a chafe-resistant chin guard, the Hedge Fleece doesn't beat around the bush.
product.name: Burton Men's Hedge Fleece 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Thermex™ fleece delivers soft comfort with moisture repellency
  • Offers breathable warmth without the itch
  • Brushed tricot internal collar lining
  • Zippered hand-warming pockets
  • Chafe-resistant chin guard
  • Full zip front closure
  • Sig Fit offers clean cut and classic silhouette
  • Fabric: brushed back sweater fleece and tricot
  • Style: 275679
  • Burton

product.description: For riding, hiking or hanging, the Burton® Men's Bonded Hoodie brings incredible comfort and quick-drying technology. Crafted from soft DRYRIDE Thermex® bonded fleece, this hooded top works hard to wick moisture away from your skin, keeping you dry and comfortable on the slopes, in the rain or when you work up a good sweat. With a hand-warming kangaroo pocket and clean, classic fit, it just may be the last hoodie you'll ever need.
product.name: Burton Men's Bonded Hoodie 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Thermex™ bonded fleece offers soft comfort with moisture-repelling power
  • Dries quickly to keep you comfortable
  • Hood with drawstring closure
  • Kangaroo handwarmer pocket
  • Ribbed hem and cuffs
  • Hidden side pocket with headphone cable hole
  • Word mark graphic on the chest
  • Sig Fit offers clean and classic silhouette
  • Fabric: DRYRIDE Thermex™ fleece
  • Style: 275692
  • Burton

product.description: Delivering zonal insulation for versatile warmth and high-level performance, the Burton® Men's Poacher Jacket is light in bulk but heavy on style and winter-weather protection. Fitted to give you a classic silhouette and built to handle cold climate extremes, the Poacher Jacket looks as incredible as it feels. Double-entry chest pockets let you stow your items on-the-go, while an insulated hood shows some much-needed love to your head.
product.name: Burton Men's Poacher Jacket 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Durashell dual-layer fabric provides breathability and moisture-wicking properties
  • 3M™ Thinsulate™ insulation provides versatile warmth and performance
  • Mesh-Lined Pit Zips™ provide ventilation where you need it most
  • Critically-taped seams
  • Fulltime contoured hood with insulation
  • Double-entry chest pockets
  • Internal mesh goggle pocket with audio stash
  • Sig Fit provides a clean and classic silhouette
  • Fixed waist gaiter with jacket-to-pant interface
  • Fabric: DRYRIDE Durashell nylon twill
  • Style: 276410Y
  • Burton

product.description: Lightly insulated and long-fitting, the Burton® Men's Groucho Jacket adds stealth style to your armory of winter apparel. Decorated with all the sleigh bells and whistles you could need from a jacket, this outerwear essential features an elastic hem, stash sleeve pocket and internal mesh audio pocket for outstanding versatility and practical wear. Lined with crisp taffeta and soft Sherpa fleece, you simply can't go wrong.
product.name: Burton Men's Groucho Jacket 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Durashell dual-layer fabric provides breathability and moisture-wicking properties
  • 3M™ Thinsulate™ insulation provides versatile warmth and performance
  • Taffeta lining with soft Sherpa fleece offers incredible comfort
  • Mesh-Lined Pit Zips™ provide ventilation where you need it most
  • Critically-taped seams
  • Elastic hem
  • Fulltime contoured hood with insulation
  • Stash pocket on sleeve
  • Internal mesh goggle pocket with audio stash
  • Team fit provides extra length and coverage
  • Fixed waist gaiter with jacket-to-pant interface
  • Fabric: DRYRIDE Durashell twill
  • Style: 276400
  • Burton

product.description: Whether sledding or shredding is your game, you can rock classic Burton® style this winter in the Men's Billboard Beanie. This rider-approved winter hat offers a signature skully fit that looks as great as it feels, keeping your warmth and style in check no matter how long you brave the cold. With brand logos and a unique reversible design, you can change up your look again and again.
product.name: Burton Men's Billboard Beanie
product.features:
• Reversible design delivers versatile, rider-friendly style
  • Burton® brand mark and logo prints
  • Skully fit offers great look and great fit
  • Men's one size fits all
  • Fabric: 100% acrylic
  • Style: 278797
  • Burton

product.description: It may look and feel like heavy-duty flannel, but look closer and you'll discover what the Hackett Jacket really has to offer. Rider-ready, it contains all the necessary features-fully taped seams, a waist gaiter, and venting to battle everything from sinking temps to springtime slop. A perfect combo of outerwear, flannel and weatherproofing, the Hackett Jacket is a hit, not only with the lumberjacks.
product.name: Burton Men's Hackett Jacket 2011-2012
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Durashell 2-Layer Coated Yarn-Dyed Flannel Plaid Fabric Team Fit
  • NEW Quad Package Trail Mapping: Horizontal Quilted Taffeta Lining with NEW 3M Thinsulate Platinum Insulation [40G Throughout] and X-STATIC® - The Silver Fiber® [40G Arm Pits]
  • Fully Taped Seams
  • Fulltime Bonded Heathered Fleece Contour Hood
  • Flip-Up Collar Shield
  • NEW Sound Pocket
  • NEW Venting Anti-Fog Goggle Pocket
  • Removable Waist Gaiter with Jacket-to-Pant Interface
  • Pit Zips
  • Zippered, Microfleece-Lined Handwarmer Pockets
  • Articulated Sleeves
  • Pocket Access Hem Cinch
  • Hood Cinch
  • Adjustable Cuff Closures
  • Pass Pocket
  • Pocket Key Clip
  • Burton

product.description: The Burton® Women's Society Pants are packed with technology that will take your riding to the next level. Superior waterproofing and insulation work together to keep you dry and comfortable from season to season. Great for winter and spring riding, Thinsulate keeps you warm, while mesh-lined thigh vents keep you cool when the temperatures start to rise. Seal the Society Pants to any Burton® jacket to completely block out the snow.
product.name: Burton Women's Society Pants 2012-2013
product.features:
• DRYRIDE Ultrashell 2-layer fabric keeps you bone dry from the inside out with the waterproof/breathability of this rugged fabric
  • WARMTH: mapped with 3M Thinsulate insulation is constructed from unique, high-loft microfibers for increased warmth with less bulk. It is breathable, water-resistant and durable, while improving mobility
  • WATERPROOFING: DRYRIDE Durashell 2-layer flat face woven fabric
  • Sig fit; classic, rider-focused articulated fit, built with room to sag and layer underneath. Relaxed from thigh to cuff, the leg comes in slightly at the knee
  • Taffeta Lining
  • Mesh-lined inner thigh vents
  • Zippered microfleece-lined handwarmer pockets
  • Jacket-to-pant interface
  • Boot gaiter with cuff-to-boot interface
  • Headphone cable port
  • Engineered articulation
  • Integrated waist adjustment
  • Ghetto slits
  • Snap-Up Leg Lifts - keep your cuffs scuff-free
  • Fully taped seams
  • Lower rise to sit below your belly button
  • Fabric: DRYRIDE Durashell 2-layer flat face woven fabric
  • Style: 276521
  • Burton
